examples.example: 他在业务上不断钻研，取得了很大的进步。

translate.english: He keeps delving into the business and has made great progress.

examples.example: 他努力拓展业务领域，为公司的发展做出了巨大贡献。

translate.english: He worked hard to expand the business field and made great contributions to the development of the company.

examples.example: 小王对待业务十分认真负责，总是能高效地完成各项任务。

translate.english: Xiao Wang is very serious and responsible towards the business and always can complete various tasks efficiently.
